title: Do the Hard Part Later!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Shizuko, what are you reading?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>The script for the next play....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hmph-, look at me when you’re talking to me~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ah, I’m sorry, Kasumi-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Is it interesting?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>The story is really interesting.... But I think performing it would be hard....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hmm.... Hey, Kasumin wants to see videos of Ophelia~, show me~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Sure, absolutely! You see, this morning, I got a very cute spot of her recorded when we went for a walk. She was just picking up her favorite branch, but it was so big that she had to drag it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Alright! Shizuko’s furrowed eyebrows have turned into happy eyebrows! When you read a fun story, you should enjoy the fun part first! Think about the play after you read the whole thing, after! At least that’s what Kasumin would do~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Kasumi-san.... You can be really smart sometimes, huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Sometimes!? What do you mean sometimes---!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I love the part of you that could think that way<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ehehe, ehehe. That means always, right~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
